info.description: A multi-cloud Blueprint API for Cloud Automation Services
info.title: VMware Cloud Assembly Blueprint API

get.description:
The page contains information about the supported API versions and the latest API version. The version parameter is optional but highly recommended.
If you do not specify explicitly an exact version, you will be calling the latest supported API version.
Here is an example of a call which specifies the exact version you are using: GET /blueprint/api/blueprints?apiVersion=2019-09-12

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property (asc|desc). Default sort order is descending on updatedAt. Sorting is supported on fields createdAt, updatedAt, createdBy, updatedBy.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Fields to include in content. Use * to get all fields.

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: Number of records you want to skip

parameters.name: apiVersion
parameters.description: The version of the API in yyyy-MM-dd format (UTC). For versioning information please refer to /blueprint/api/about
